title: Lawn tennis and how to play it: the service
brief_description: First of a series of six instructional films supervised by Captain H.R. Brand, this film shjows a number of important points about the service which every aspiring tennis champion must know. Demonstrations are given by Mary Heeley and Horace Skeet, All England Tennis Club Professional and Coach.
